thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Bryan Gillis
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Bryan Gillis

author: Bryan Gillis
title: Bryan Gillis
text:
Finn recommended three companies, two of which gave Quote: s. The third declined when it "discovered" that the property was two storeys. If they had taken the trouble to come and visit my house they would have realized that all the panels needed would have to be placed on the ground floor roof space as the upper storey roof space is not suitable. The company's name is Green Wiring and I give them naught out of 10 for effort!!!!
Technaus Solar and Infinite Energy both gave close competitive Quote: s but I gave the business to Infinite Energy as the inverters were both the same but the panels were different, with Infinite's recommended panels being slightly better quality. Their sales guy Neil was also a pleasure to deal with. He listened to me and answered all my questions and, whilst he was knowledgeable about the product range, he had the courage and sense to admit it when he didn't know the answer but promised to, AND DID, get back to me. He was in no way pushy or full of the usual sales bulls..t.
